T04sanss15u:5: iha gṛhapate gṛhī bodhisatvo dharmeṇa bhogān paryeṣate nâdharmeṇa |
T04sanss15u:9: na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvêryāpatham āracayati |
T04sanss15u:11: na śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ kramān utkṣipati na nikṣipati yugamātraprekṣikayā
T04sanss15u:17: na bodhisatvo lābhahetor lābhanidānaṃ mandabhāṇī mṛdubhāṇī na priyabhāṇī bhavati |
T04sanss15u:20: bodhisatvo dāyakena dānapatinā vā lābhena pravāryamāṇo vā câlpêcchatāṃ darśayati |
T04sanss15u:22: antardāhâiṣa kulaputra yad vācâlpêcchatā cittena lābhakāmatā |
T04sanss15u:23: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kuhanalapanalābhâpagato bhavati |
T04sanss15u:25: na bodhisatvo dānapatiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ karoti |
T04sanss15u:29: na ca taṃ dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ vā kiṃcit prārthayate |
T04sanss15u:32: yāvan na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvâivaṃ vācaṃ niścārayati |
T04sanss15u:35: kena vā me dānapatinâmukaṃ vastu pratipāditaṃ tasya ca mayâmukôpakāraḥ
T04sanss15u:37: tena me śīlavān ayam iti kṛtvêdaṃ cêdaṃ ca dattaṃ bahuśrutêti |
T04sanss15u:39: mayā ca tasya kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya parigṛhītaṃ |
T04sanss15u:41: tatra kāyakṣatir yad uta lābhahetor lābhanidānam ādhāvanaparidhāvanaṃ dauḥśīlyasamudācaraṇaṃ ca |
T04sanss15u:47: iha bodhisatvo na tulākūṭena na mānakūṭena na visraṃbhaghātikayā na dhūrtatayā lābham upārjayati
T04sanss15u:50: ye te lābhā staupikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā dhārmikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā sāṃghikasaṃsṛṣṭā vâdattā vânanujñātā vā
T04sanss15u:57: mātāpitṛmitrâmātyajñātisālohitebhyaḥ kālânukālam ātmanā paribhuṅkte paribhuñjānaś câraktaḥ paribhuṅkte |
T04sanss15u:58: svanadhyavasito na câlabhyamāne lābhe khedacittam utpādayati |
T04sanss15u:59: na paritapyati na ca dāyakadānapatīnām antike 'prasādacittam utpādayatîty
T04sanss15u:61: tatrâiṣâpy asya bodhisatvasya bhogaśuddhir ātmabhāvaśuddhivat parahitāya bhavet ||
T04sanss15u:63: punar aparaṃ bhadanta śāriputra ye praviśantîdaṃ gṛhaṃ teṣāṃ samanantarapraviṣṭānāṃ sarvakleśā na bādhante 'yaṃ dvitīyâścaryâdbhuto dharmaḥ ||
T04sanss15u:65: atha tato bhojanāt sarvāvatī sā parṣat tṛptā bhūtā |
T04sanss15u:67: yaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālais tad anyaiś ca satvais tad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ tā-
T04sanss15u:72: sarvaromakūpebhyaś ca teṣāṃ tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti |
T04sanss15u:73: tad yathâpi nāma tasyām eva sarvagandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau vṛkṣāṇāṃ gandhaḥ ||
T04sanss15u:75: yaiś ca bhadantânanda bhikṣubhir anavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām evâvakrāntaniyamānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati |
T04sanss15u:77: yair anutpāditabodhicittaiḥ satvaiḥ paribhuktaṃ teṣām utpāditabodhicittānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati |
T04sanss15u:78: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nâpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyatîti vistaraḥ
T04sanss15u:88: yathā gaganaṃ samaviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti ||
T04sanss15u:90: yathā gaganam aparyantam evam aparyantīkṛtena cittena tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanss15u:91: yathā gaganaṃ vistīrṇam anāvaraṇam evaṃ bodhipariṇāmitaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti
T04sanss15u:92: yathā gaganam arūpi evaṃ sarvarūpâniśritaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanss15u:95: evam asaṃjñi asaṃskṛtam avijñaptilakṣaṇam evam apratijñānaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanss15u:96: yathā gaganaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetraspharaṇam evaṃ sarvasatvamaitrīspharaṇaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanss15u:98: yathā gaganaṃ sadāprakāśam evaṃ cittaprakṛtiviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dada-ti |
T04sanss15u:99: yathā gaganaṃ sarvasatvâvakāśaṃ evaṃ sarvasatvôpajīvyaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanss15u:100: yāvad yathā nirmito nirmitāya dadāti nirvikalpo 'nābhogaḥ |
T04sanss15u:109: evaṃ tyāgacittaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvo gaganasamadāno bhavati ||
T04sanss15u:115: nâsti nikrandadānaṃ yāvan nâsti yācanakeṣûpataptadānaṃ nâsty
T04sanss15u:116: uccagghana*ullāpanadānaṃ nâsti parāṅmukhadānaṃ nâsty apaviddhadānaṃ nâsty asvahastadānaṃ
T04sanss15u:119: nâsty akāladānaṃ nâsti viṣaśastradānaṃ nâsti satvaviheṭhanādānam iti ||
T04sanss15u:125: madyapānād api nairāśyakṛte bodhisatve pratigho garīyān |
T04sanss15u:128: śastrâdiṣv api yady anubadhagurulâdyavavicārād dānam āpadyeta |
T04sanss15u:137: śuddhaṃ gaganaṃ śuddhaṃ tacchīlaṃ |vimalaṃ gaganaṃ vimalaṃ tacchīlaṃ |
T04sanss15u:141: yāvad achedyâbhedyaṃ gaganam achedyâbhedyaṃ tacchīlam ity ādi ||
T04sanss15u:143: samaprayogaṃ gaganaṃ sarvasatvasamacittasya kṣāntipariśuddhir ity ādi ||
T04sanss15u:151: na kalpo na vikalpo na parikalpaḥ ||
T04sanss15u:152: yâivaṃ kṣāntir iyaṃ bodhisatvasya paramā gaganasamā kṣāntir |
T04sanss15u:184: yāvad iyaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitā caryāpariśuddhir iti ||
T04sanss15u:188: |saddharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca bodhisatvacaryâtyajanagocaraś câyam api bodhisatvasya gocara |
